== Useful books and materials ==

=== Microprocessor Arch/uArch ===

 * *[http://lib.mipt.ru/book/267604/ Computer Organization and Design: The Hardware/Software Interface, Patterson D.A., Hennessy J.L., 3rd Edition] (Eng)* - the main book for this course. It contains all that you need to know about the computer architecture and MIPS ISA.

=== Programming ===

 * *[http://lib.mipt.ru/book/27518/ C++ manual, Herbert Schildt, 3rd edition] (Rus)* - this is the main book for studing `C++` in this project. The complexity growths from the zero level, thus, even if you don't know `C` you can learn `C++` using this book.

== Instructions to use downloading material ==

=== How to play audio narrations in Powerpoint ===
Some presentation contains recorded audio from the seminar (narration). Usually, it is marked with phrase _"Rus/End audio"_ near a link in the table above. Those presentation that contain narrations can be played in [http://office.microsoft.com/en-us/powerpoint/ MS Powerpoint] as an ordinary video (we have verified it in Powerpoint 2010).

To start playing select the following values in the check boxes on _Slide Show_ tab (point 1):

||<img src="http://mipt-mips.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/how_to_play_narrations_in_powerpoint.png" width="650">||

Then click _From Beginning_ button (point 2), which starts the presentation with audio and automatic animations from the first foil. You also can start this mode from any slide, pause it and so on. If you want to look the presentation without animations and audio just deselect the check boxes.
